<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var theForm = document.forms['mainform'];
if (!theForm) {
    theForm = document.mainform;
}
function __doPostBack(eventTarget, eventArgument) {
    if (!theForm.onsubmit || (theForm.onsubmit() != false)) {
        theForm.__EVENTTARGET.value = eventTarget;
        theForm.__EVENTARGUMENT.value = eventArgument;
        theForm.submit();
    }
}
//]]>
</script>

<!-- TEMPLATION STATION -->
<script id="cartitems-template" type="text/x-jquery-tmpl" charset="utf-8">
    ${SCAdditionalDescription="Holiday Campaign", ""}
  <h1>${TotalItemsInCart} product{{if TotalItemsInCart > 1}}s{{/if}}</h1>
    <ul class="item-list">
        {{each(i, LineItem) LineItems.LineItem}}
     {{if LineItem.BundleItems.length !=0}}
	   <li class="bundleoffer">
           <h2>{{if LineItem.AdditionalDescription != undefined}}
                ${LineItem.AdditionalDescription}
            {{else}}
                ${SCAdditionalDescription}
            {{/if}}
            
            <a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="shoppingCart.remove('${LineItem.ID}');" class="remove">Remove from cart</a></h2>
           {{else}}
	   <li>{{/if}}
      <div class="item is-gift-wrapping-${IsGiftWrapping}">
          <img src="~/service/ProductImage?type=cart&pid=${ProductID}&h=150&w=150" width="150" height="150" alt="" />
          <h2>${LineItem.ProductName}</h2>
          <div class="info">
              ${LineItem.CartDescription}
          
          </div>
          <div class="cart-buttons">
              <div class="update-cart">
                  <a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="shoppingCart.delta(-1, this);" class="minus"></a>
                  <span class="amount">
                      <input type="text" value="${LineItem.Quantity}" onchange="shoppingCart.set(${LineItem.ProductID}, '${LineItem.ID}', this.value);" /></span>
                  <a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="shoppingCart.delta(1, this);" class="plus"></a>
                  <a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="shoppingCart.remove('${LineItem.ID}');" class="remove">Remove from cart</a>
              </div>
              {{if LineItem.Price.TotalDiscount != 0}}
         <strike>
            <span>${LineItem.Price.Currency}</span> ${LineItem.Price.FormattedTotalOriginalPrice}
         </strike>
              {{/if}}
         <div class="price">
             <span class="price-2nd"><span class="currency">${LineItem.Price.Currency}</span>${LineItem.Price.FormattedTotalSalesPriceExVat}</span>
         </div>
          </div>
      </div>

           {{if LineItem.BundleItems.length !=0}} 
	    {{each(j, BundleItem) LineItem.BundleItems}}
		<div class="add"></div>
           <div class="item">
               <img src="~/service/ProductImage?type=cart&pid=${ProductID}&h=150&w=150" width="150" height="150" alt="" />
               <h2>${BundleItem.ProductName}</h2>
               <div class="info">
                   ${BundleItem.CartDescription}          
               </div>
               <div class="cart-buttons">
                   <div class="update-cart"><span class="offer">Bundled offer with ${LineItem.ProductName}</span></div>
                   <strike>
            <span>${BundleItem.Price.Currency}</span> ${BundleItem.Price.FormattedTotalOriginalPrice }
         </strike>
                   <div class="price">
                       <span class="price-2nd"><span class="currency">${BundleItem.Price.Currency}</span>${BundleItem.Price.FormattedTotalSalesPriceExVat}</span>
                   </div>
               </div>
           </div>
           {{/each}}
	  {{/if}}
       </li>
        {{if i == LineItems.LineItem.length - 1}}
     <div class="total"></div>
        {{else}}
     <div class="add"></div>
        {{/if}}
    {{/each}}
    </ul>
    <div class="total">
        <div class="total-price">
            <div class="header">Total</div>
            <span class="price"><span class="currency">${Pricing.OrderTotal.Currency}</span>${Pricing.OrderTotal.FormattedPriceExVat}</span>
        </div>
        <div class="shadow"></div>
    </div>
</script>

                <div id="main" role="main" class="CenterContent" style="background-color: " >
                    <div class="MainContentWrapper" >
                        <div class="Header" style="max-width:980px;margin: 0 auto;" >
                            <article class="content wysiwyg"><div style="padding-top: 45px;"><h1 class="blog-title" style="padding-left: 10px;">We&#39;re Sorry</h1><div class="rich-text-field paddingRichText"><!--EndNoIndex--><div style="padding-left: 10px;">
<p>
We are currently working on the site.</p>
<p><a href="http://beoplay.com">
<strong>Please, take me back to the front page<br>
</strong></a></p>
<p>Sorry for the inconvenience.,</p>
</div><!--BeginNoIndex--></div></div><div class="quotebox"><div class="quote"></div><div class="source"></div></div></article>
                        </div>
                     
                        <div class="content" >
                            
                        </div>
                         <div class="contentCentred">
                            
                     </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/chrome-frame/1.0.3/CFInstall.min.js"></script>
        <script>window.attachEvent('onload',function(){CFInstall.check({mode:'overlay'})})</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
            
    </script>
    
    
    
    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function bodyHeightCheck(){
            //Check for finding spots
            var _spots = document.getElementsByClassName("productindex-introcontainer");
            function footerResized(e){
                var footerHeight = jQuery(".slidefooter:first").height();
                jQuery(".footerslideover").css("min-height", (BeoGlobal._reliableSh - footerHeight) + "px");
            }
            if(_spots.length == 0){
                BeoEvents(window, "resize", footerResized, true);
                footerResized(null);
            }
        })();
    </script>
</body>
</html>
